name: edomus-project-frontend
description: Edomus App for mobile home control.
author: Sergio Calero Robles y Diego Valbuena Pineda

scripts.build:android:production: cross-env ENV=production ionic cordova build android --prod
scripts.build:android:test: cross-env ENV=test ionic cordova build android
scripts.build:android:stage: cross-env ENV=stage ionic cordova build android
scripts.build:android:development: cross-env ENV=development ionic cordova build android
scripts.build:browser:production: cross-env ENV=production ionic cordova build browser --prod
scripts.build:browser:test: cross-env ENV=test ionic cordova build browser
scripts.build:browser:stage: cross-env ENV=stage ionic cordova build browser
scripts.build:browser:development: cross-env ENV=development ionic cordova build browser
scripts.prepare:ios:production: cross-env ENV=production ionic cordova prepare ios --prod
scripts.prepare:ios:stage: cross-env ENV=stage ionic cordova prepare ios
scripts.prepare:ios:test: cross-env ENV=test ionic cordova prepare ios
scripts.prepare:ios:development: cross-env ENV=development ionic cordova prepare ios
scripts.release:browser:production: npm run build:browser:production && gulp move-release-to-dist --environment production
scripts.release:browser:test: npm run build:browser:test && gulp move-release-to-dist --environment test
scripts.release:browser:stage: npm run build:browser:stage && gulp move-release-to-dist --environment stage
scripts.release:browser:development: npm run build:browser:development && gulp move-release-to-dist --environment development
scripts.release:browser: npm run release:browser:production && npm run release:browser:test && npm run release:browser:stage && npm run release:browser:development
